description.en:
2ACoin is a gun enthusiasts crypto-currency. Designed/developed to provide education and knowledge about the American 2nd Amendment to the U.S. Bill of Rights established on December 15, 1791. 

2ACoin provides a mechanism for securely tracking/recording the transfer of assets relating to firearms. In addition, 2ACoin includes a pre-mine the funding of education on firearm safety and support of the 2nd Amendment protection.
